DOC.brief_summary: Functional neuroimaging study show cerebellum active cognitive performance . The investigator hypothesize stimulation cerebellum transcranial magnetic stimulation produce brief change performance task , suggest cerebellar activation necessary normal cognitive function .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation Cerebellum Cognition
DOC.criteria: 1930 year age Informed consent History seizure family history epilepsy History stroke Presence metal anywhere head except mouth Presence cardiac pacemaker Presence cochlear implant Presence implant medication pump History heart disease Presence intracardiac line Increased intracranial pressure , infarction trauma Children , outside age range Pregnancy Currently take tricyclic antidepressant neuroleptic medication History head trauma History respiratory disease
